long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generates Guid/UUIDs with the click of a button.

Alt+Shift+G will generate an alert with a Guid to copy.

Alt+Shift+C will generate a Guid on your clipboard.

Code can be found here: https://github.com/davidemily/GuidGenerator
